item.title: dbGaP update
item.description: A few days ago I finished uploading sequences to dbGaP. I have a better grasp at the process and I believe I can semi-automate it, but it will take some time to come up with a reasonable plan for the summer.

item.title: Uploading data to dbGap
item.description:
Ok… hear me out. The process of publishing a study in dbGaP is a multi-step process that cannot be automated. At least totally.

Right now I am working on uploading files. The process is straight-forward, however one needs to be really careful making sure that I am uploading the appropiate files.
